overview: Whether they're looking to score some weed or hook up on the DL, the 'Beach Rats of Lauderdale' will do whatever it takes to get some.  When Lauderdale is dry with no weed in sight, one of the Beach Rats hatch a plan to score big. It's risky for the group but the venture pays off. Follow this group of studs, on a raw, wild, sexually-charged ride around the seedy side of South Florida.
tagline: What will happen to the 'Beach Rats of Lauderdale'?
title: Beach Rats
